mapper.select: SELECT ID, APP_ID as appId, APP_SCREEN_SHOOT as appScreenShoot, SIZE, STATUS, CREATED, CREATER FROM app_screen_shoots ORDER BY CREATED DESC
SELECT ID, APP_ID as appId, APP_SCREEN_SHOOT as appScreenShoot, SIZE, STATUS, CREATED FROM app_screen_shoots WHERE CREATER = #{developerId} AND STATUS > 0
SELECT ID, APP_ID as appId, APP_SCREEN_SHOOT as appScreenShoot, SIZE, STATUS, CREATED FROM app_screen_shoots WHERE APP_ID = #{appId} AND STATUS > 0
SELECT ID, APP_ID as appId, APP_SCREEN_SHOOT as appScreenShoot, SIZE, STATUS, CREATED, CREATER FROM app_screen_shoots WHERE ID = #{id} LIMIT 0, 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_screen_shoots (ID, APP_ID, APP_SCREEN_SHOOT, SIZE, STATUS, CREATER) VALUES (#{id}, #{appId}, #{appScreenShoot}, #{size}, 2, #{creater})
mapper.update: UPDATE app_screen_shoots SET STATUS = 4 WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS > 0
